messages.subject: offering information
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/22/02 11:08:06 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/22/02 11:08:06 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
Wonderful post, Ren!
I love all your ideas. They're so inspirational!
Hey, I think YOU should be speaking at the conference, too.
I always get a lot out of things you say.
I love your unschooling spirit - it's contagious! :o)

Karin >>

Wow...thanks Karin.
I do enjoy public speaking and am currently checking into holding a "natural
learning" seminar at the local health food store.
I don't have a lot of extra time with a wee babsy man around, but maybe when
the kids are older.
That was very sweet, I get a lot out of your posts also.
Ren
